verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> Apostle <WG652> Of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> ' According To The <WG2596> Command <WG2003> Of God <WG2316> <WG4990> Our Saviour, <WG2257> And <WG2532> Of The Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> <WG3588> <WG1680> Our Hope, <WG2257>

To Timothy, <WG5095> My True <WG1103> Child <WG5043> In <WG1722> Faith; <WG4102> Grace, <WG5485> Mercy, <WG1656> Peace, <WG1515> From <WG575> God <WG2316> <WG3962> Our Father <WG2257> And <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG2962> Our Lord. <WG2257>

Even As <WG2531> I Besought <WG3870> Thee <WG4571> To Remain <WG4357> In <WG1722> Ephesus, When I Was <WG2181> Going <WG4198> To <WG1519> Macedonia, <WG3109> That <WG2443> Thou Mightest Charge <WG3853> Some <WG5100> Not <WG3361> To Teach Other Doctrines, <WG2085>

Nor <WG3366> To Give Heed <WG4337> To Fables <WG3454> And <WG2532> Genealogies <WG1076> Interminable, <WG562> Which <WG3748> Questionings <WG2214> Bring <WG3930> Rather <WG3123> Than <WG2228> Administration <WG3622> God's <WG2316> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Faith. <WG4102>

<WG3588> But The <WG1161> End <WG5056> Of The <WG3588> Charge <WG3852> Is <WG2076> Love <WG26> Out Of <WG1537> Pure <WG2513> A Heart <WG2588> And <WG2532> A Conscience <WG4893> Good <WG18> And <WG2532> Faith <WG4102> Unfeigned; <WG505>
From Which <WG3739> Some, <WG5100> Having Missed The Mark, <WG795> Turned Aside <WG1624> To <WG1519> Vain Talking, <WG3150>

Wishing <WG2309> To Be <WG1511> <WG3547> Law Teachers, <WG3361> Understanding <WG3539> Neither <WG3383> What <WG3739> They Say, <WG3004> Nor <WG3383> Concerning <WG4012> What <WG5101> They Strongly Affirm. <WG1226>
<WG1492> Now We Know <WG1161> That <WG3754> Good Is <WG2570> The <WG3588> Law, <WG3551> If <WG1437> Anyone <WG5100> It <WG846> Lawfully <WG3545> Use, <WG5530>

Knowing <WG1492> This, <WG5124> That <WG3754> For A Righteous One <WG1342> Law <WG3551> <WG3756> Is Not Enacted, <WG2749> <WG459> But For Lawless <WG1161> And <WG2532> Insubordinate Ones, <WG506> For The Ungodly <WG765> And <WG2532> Sinful, <WG268> For The Unholy <WG462> And <WG2532> Profane, <WG952> For Smiters Of Fathers <WG3964> And <WG2532> Smiters Of Mothers; <WG3389> For Slayers Of Man, <WG409>

Fornicators, <WG4205> Abusers Of Themselves With Men, <WG733> Men Stealers, <WG405> Liars, <WG5583> Perjurers, <WG1965> And <WG2532> If <WG1487> Any Thing <WG5100> Other <WG2087> <WG3588> To Sound <WG5198> Teaching <WG1319> Is Opposed, <WG480>
According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Of The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> Of The <WG3588> Blessed <WG3107> God, <WG2316> Which <WG3739> Was Entrusted With <WG4100> I. <WG1473>

And <WG2532> <WG5485> I Thank <WG2192> Him Who <WG3588> Strengthened <WG1743> Me, <WG3165> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> <WG3588> <WG2962> Our Lord, <WG2257> That <WG3754> Faithful <WG4103> Me <WG3165> He Esteemed, <WG2233> Appointing Me <WG5087> To <WG1519> Service, <WG1248>

<WG3588> Previously <WG4386> Being <WG5607> A Blasphemer <WG989> And <WG2532> Persecutor <WG1376> And <WG2532> Insolent; <WG5197> ' But <WG235> I Was Shewn Mercy, <WG1653> Because <WG3754> Being Ignorant <WG50> I Did <WG4160> It In <WG1722> Unbelief. <WG570>

<WG5250> But Superabounded <WG1161> The <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> <WG3588> <WG2962> Of Our Lord <WG2257> With <WG3326> Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Love <WG26> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Faithful <WG4103> Is The <WG3588> Word, <WG3056> And <WG2532> Of All <WG3956> Acceptation <WG594> Worthy, <WG514> That <WG3754> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> Came <WG2064> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> World <WG2889> Sinners <WG268> To Save, <WG4982> Of Whom The <WG3739> First <WG4413> Am <WG1510> I. <WG1473>

But <WG235> <WG1223> For This Reason <WG5124> I Was Shewn Mercy, <WG1653> That <WG2443> In <WG1722> Me, The <WG1698> First, <WG4413> Might Shew Forth <WG1731> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> The <WG3588> Whole <WG3956> Longsuffering, <WG3115> For <WG4314> A Delineation <WG5296> Of Those <WG3588> Being About <WG3195> To Believe <WG4100> ' On <WG1909> Him <WG846> To <WG1519> Life <WG2222> Eternal. <WG166>

<WG3588> Now To The <WG1161> King <WG935> Of The <WG3588> Ages, The <WG165> Incorruptible, <WG862> Invisible, <WG517> Only <WG3441> Wise <WG4680> God, <WG2316> Honour <WG5092> And <WG2532> Glory <WG1391> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Ages <WG165> Of The <WG3588> Ages. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

This <WG3778> <WG3588> Charge <WG3852> I Commit <WG3908> To Thee, My <WG4671> Child <WG5043> Timothy, <WG5095> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Going Before <WG4254> As To <WG1909> Thee <WG4571> Prophecies, <WG4394> That <WG2443> Thou Mightest War <WG4754> By <WG1722> Them <WG846> The <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Warfare, <WG4752>

Holding <WG2192> Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Good <WG18> A Conscience; <WG4893> Which Conscience <WG3739> Some, <WG5100> Having Cast Away, <WG683> As To <WG4012> <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> Made Shipwreck; <WG3489>

Of Whom <WG3739> Are <WG2076> Hymenaeus <WG5211> And <WG2532> Alexander, <WG223> Whom <WG3739> I Delivered Up <WG3860> <WG3588> To Satan, <WG4567> That <WG2443> They May Be Disciplined <WG3811> Not <WG3361> To Blaspheme. <WG987>
